eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.api.ds

Interface AdvanceDataStore

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AdvanceDataStoreUpdate
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CheckedDataStore, DummyDataStore, HttpRemoteDataStore, JDBCDataStore, LocalDataStore

    public interface AdvanceDataStore
extends AdvanceDataStoreUpdate
    Interface for performing datastore related operations.
    Author:
    akarnokd, 2011.09.23.
